languages.text: Незадолго до смерти Идира исчезла с поста. С ней исчезла и Джай. Вернувшись спустя много циклов, Джай сообщила, что последние дни Идиры были полны радости и приключений, а более всех прочих забав ей нравилось наблюдать за играми пустотных китов.

Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.
languages.original_text: Незадолго до смерти Идира исчезла с поста. С ней исчезла и Джай. Вернувшись спустя много циклов, Джай сообщила, что последние дни Идиры были полны радости и приключений, а более всех прочих забав ей нравилось наблюдать за играми пустотных китов.

traits.locale_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that she had enjoyed watching the void whales play more than any other amusement.

Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that she had enjoyed watching the void whales play more than any other amusement.

Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

languages.text: 伊迪拉在临死前不久突然离开了岗位，和婕伊一起消失了。几个周期之后，婕伊回来了，说伊迪拉最后的日子里充满了欢乐与冒险，说她最大的乐趣就是看着虚空鲸开心地玩耍。
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉在临死前不久突然离开了岗位，和婕伊一起消失了。几个周期之后，婕伊回来了，说伊迪拉最后的日子里充满了欢乐与冒险，说她最大的乐趣就是看着虚空鲸开心地玩耍。

languages.text: 自身の死の少し前、イディラは持ち場から姿を消した。ジェイも彼女とともに消えた。ジェイが多くのサイクルの後に戻った時、イディラの最期は喜びと冒険に満ち溢れていたこと、彼女の最大の楽しみはヴォイドクジラが遊んでいるのを見ることであったと語った。
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: 自身の死の少し前、イディラは持ち場から姿を消した。ジェイも彼女とともに消えた。ジェイが多くのサイクルの後に戻った時、イディラの最期は喜びと冒険に満ち溢れていたこと、彼女の最大の楽しみはヴォイドクジラが遊んでいるのを見ることであったと語った。

languages.text: Peu avant sa mort, Idira disparut de son poste. Et Jae s'évapora avec elle. À son retour des cycles plus tard, Jae déclara que les derniers jours d'Idira avaient été emplis de joie et d'aventure, et que son plus grand plaisir avait été de regarder jouer les baleines du vide.
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: Peu avant sa mort, Idira disparut de son poste. Et Jae s'évapora avec elle. À son retour des cycles plus tard, Jae déclara que les derniers jours d'Idira avaient été emplis de joie et d'aventure, et que son plus grand plaisir avait été de regarder jouer les baleines du vide.

languages.text: Poco antes de su muerte, Idira desapareció de su puesto. Jae se desvaneció con ella. Cuando Jae volvió, muchos ciclos después, declaró que los últimos días de Idira habían estado llenos de alegrías y aventuras, y que su mayor placer había sido ver jugar a las ballenas del vacío.
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: Poco antes de su muerte, Idira desapareció de su puesto. Jae se desvaneció con ella. Cuando Jae volvió, muchos ciclos después, declaró que los últimos días de Idira habían estado llenos de alegrías y aventuras, y que su mayor placer había sido ver jugar a las ballenas del vacío.

languages.text: Idira verschwand kurz vor ihrem Tod von ihrem Posten. Jae war an ihrer Seite. Als Jae viele Zyklen später zurückkehrte, sagte sie, Idiras letzte Tage seien voller Freude und Abenteuer gewesen, und dass ihr größtes Vergnügen darin bestanden habe, den Leerenwalen beim Spielen zuzusehen.
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: Idira verschwand kurz vor ihrem Tod von ihrem Posten. Jae war an ihrer Seite. Als Jae viele Zyklen später zurückkehrte, sagte sie, Idiras letzte Tage seien voller Freude und Abenteuer gewesen, und dass ihr größtes Vergnügen darin bestanden habe, den Leerenwalen beim Spielen zuzusehen.

languages.text: İdira, ölümünden kısa bir süre önce görev yerinden kayboldu. Jae da onunla birlikte yok oldu. Birçok döngü sonra geri dönen Jae, İdira'nın son günlerinin neşe ve macera içinde geçtiğini, en büyük zevkinin uçsuz balinalarının oyunlarını izlemek olduğunu söyledi.
languages.original_text: Shortly before her death, Idira vanished from her post. Jae disappeared with her. When Jae returned many cycles later, she declared that Idira's last days had been full of joy and adventure, and that her greatest pleasure had been watching the void whales play.

traits.locale_text: İdira ölümünden kısa bir süre önce görev yerinden kayboldu. Jae da onunla birlikte yok oldu. Birçok döngü sonra geri dönen Jae, İdira'nın son günlerinin neşe ve macera içinde geçtiğini, en büyük zevkinin uçsuz balinalarının oyunlarını izlemek olduğunu söyledi.
